panels.title: Current Provider
Current Cost
Region

targets.query: select  "name", io_role, io_instance_type, node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, io_storage_size from alameda_cluster_status..node

select (sum(value) * 100) / ($current_cpu_total * 1000) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select sum(value) * 100 / $current_memory_total from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select (mean(value)*100) / ($current_cpu_total * 1000) from alameda_metric..cluster_cpu where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)
select mean(value)*100 / $current_memory_total from alameda_metric..cluster_memory where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)

list.label: Scope
list.name: resource
list.query: Cluster, Namespace

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="namespace" where 'Cluster' != '$resource'
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="namespace" where 'Cluster' != '$resource'

list.label: RI Consideration
list.name: purchase_option
list.query: Yes, No

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_fedemeter from recommendation_jeri with key = "country"
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: show tag values on alameda_fedemeter from recommendation_jeri with key = "country"

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: Pod
list.name: pod
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: select namespace, "policy" from (select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by namespace),(select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and namespace = '$ns' group by namespace)
list.name: h_ns
list.query: select namespace, "policy" from (select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by namespace),(select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and namespace = '$ns' group by namespace)

list.definition: select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from ( select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by alameda_scaler_name), ( select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_name)
list.name: h_scaler
list.query: select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from ( select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by alameda_scaler_name), ( select alameda_scaler_name, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_name)

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.name: h_pod
list.query: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select "name", restart_count from (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.name: h_container
list.query: select "name", restart_count from (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select starttime from alameda_fedemeter..recommendation_jeri where granularity = '86400' and provider = 'aws'  and (("reservedinstances" = '0' and 'No' = '$purchase_option') or ("reservedinstances" = '1' and 'Yes' = '$purchase_option')) and time >= now()-2d  and time <= now() and country = '$country' order by time desc limit 1

list.name: daily_gcp_region
list.query: select region from alameda_fedemeter..recommendation_jeri where granularity = '3600' and provider = 'gcp' and starttime = '$gcp_stime_daily' and ( ( "reservedinstances" = '1' and 'Yes' = '$purchase_option')  or ( "reservedinstances" = '0' and 'No' = '$purchase_option') ) and country = '$country' order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select sum(totalcost) from alameda_fedemeter..recommendation_jeri  where granularity = '3600' and provider = 'aws' and starttime = '$aws_stime_daily' and ( ( "reservedinstances" = '1' and 'Yes' = '$purchase_option') or ( "reservedinstances" = '0' and 'No' = '$purchase_option' )) and country = '$country'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from node with key = "name" where 'Cluster' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader')
list.name: node
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from node with key = "name" where 'Cluster' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader')
